A4.text: They returned to the World Series as defending champions in 2025, defeating the Toronto Blue Jays in 7 games.

A5.text: They returned to the World Series in 2024, defeating the New York Yankees in 5 games.

A6.text: The Dodgers would not make another World Series appearance until 2017

A7.text: They would not win another World Series until 2020

A8.text: The Dodgers would win the World Series.

A9.text: In 2020, the Los Angeles Dodgers defeated the Tampa Bay Rays in six games to win their first World Series since 1988, and their seventh championship in franchise history, during a season that was shortened to 60 games by the COVID-19 pandemic.

A10.text: The Dodgers made three World Series appearances in the 1960s: a 1963 win over the Yankees, a 1965 win over the Minnesota Twins and a 1966 loss to the Baltimore Orioles.
